name: Blessing weave
description:
These hand woven blessings are made with love from ingredients chosen for both their smell and their symbolism.
White Sage - from my garden. Native American Indians used white sage for its cleansing properties and it is normally found wrapped for smudge sticks. It has a very powerful smell.
Lavender - from a friends garden. Calming and relaxing, used in many therapeutic items.
Maiden hair- from my garden. I chose to use Maiden Hair vines to wrap the blessings to impart feminity, elegance, fragility and strength.
Sandalwood- from a camping trip to The Bluff, WA, Australia. Sandalwood has a very earthy aroma, balancing the other smells and imparting masculine strength, warmth and stillness.
Copper- Each piece is secured with copper wire to enhance conductivity of the other energies.
Comes in a set of three.
Each blessing can be burnt in cleansing rituals, kept in ur purse as a mindful smell item, or kept by your side when sleeping or traveling.

name: Sweet purse
description:
Gorgeous hand embellished purse.
Use for carrying your tumblestones, coins, lipgloss or as a package for a pair of our Mermaid earrings. Zipper closing and perfect for any size hands!

Approx 9cm x 11cm

categories.name: Fashion for Godesses and peaceful warriors

name: Navaho balance berry earrings
description:
Traditionally used by the Navaho in ceremonial jewellry, these beads are made from the seeds of Juniper berries. The plant must have a female and male species located next to each other to bear fruit, which is eaten away by ants to reveal the seed and a small hole. The hole is then drilled through in traditional way, signifying man and nature working together in harmony.
Tribally worn, strands of these are used as protection from evil spirits.
I have combined these "ghost berries" with small copper beads, using the conductive nature of copper to amplify the goodness, balance and harmonious wish to both the wearer and those close enough to see them.

categories.name: Fashion for Godesses and peaceful warriors

name: Mermaid tail simples
description:
These gorgeous lavender sea shells from Merewether Beach, NSW, Australia resemble the tails of mermaids so closely, you are sure to feel it when you wear them!
Handmade with love and wrapped with mindfulness.
Available in brass, copper or Silver Nickel.

description:
These tiny spines of Sea Urchins tinkle like bells at your ears. From Merewether Beach, NSW, Australia and available with copper or silver nickel chain and earring hooks.
Sweet, handmade and found goodness from the sea...

name: Star Child - A planetary guide to your little one..
description:
This beautiful report is customized based on the exact time and place your child was born. Written by Gloria Starr, it provides insight into what the universe, stars and and planets symbolized as potential for your favorite boy or girl child.
A beautiful shower or birth gift, this report also makes insightful reading for any parent, providing helpful clues on approaching the unique character traits of each child.
Please provide child's name place time and date of birth along with your order and any special instructions eg, gift recipients email address.
Report will be emailed to you express from the stars..

NB/ Found this very helpful from my own personal experience - love this! - E
